Package com.bitwig.extension.controller.api

Interface MasterTrack

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, DeleteableObject, DeviceChain, DuplicableObject, ObjectProxy, Subscribable, Track
public interface MasterTrack extends Track
A special kind of track that represents the master track in Bitwig Studio.
Since:
API version 1
